titles.title: Providing for the designation of certain minority employees.
Providing for the designation of certain minority employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution names six individuals to fill specified minority party employee positions in the House of Representatives and authorizes the minority leader to appoint and set the annual rate of pay for up to three further minority employees.
